DOC.brief_summary: The main study objective investigate whether female sex worker ( FSWs ) drop-in center Mombasa , Kenya , report harmful hazardous alcohol intake participate brief alcohol intervention ( vs. participate nutrition intervention control group ) , reduce alcohol use incidence STIs , HIV , sexual violence , well increase condom use .
DOC.brief_title: Alcohol Harm Reduction Intervention Among Female Sex Workers Mombasa , Kenya
DOC.detailed_description: This longitudinal intervention study among female sex worker affiliate APHIA II program , harmful hazardous alcohol use pattern . The purpose study obtain initial estimate impact intervention alcohol use STI acquisition , help determine program implement fully . Female sex worker recruit three APHIA drop-in center Mombasa district , Kenya serve 15,000 FSWs . Approximately 800 FSWs harmful hazardous alcohol use enrol study six-month accrual period follow-up 12 month participant . FSWs randomly assign either intervention `` active '' control arm . The intervention arm receive Brief Intervention Alcohol Use ( BI ) , design individual harmful hazardous alcohol use , addition information nutrition . The control arm receive non-alcohol relate information nutrition study period . A peer educator APHIA II project inform potential participant study . A trained nurse counselor research assistant screen interested volunteer harmful alcohol use validate AUDIT questionnaire ( WHO , 2001 ) obtain informed consent eligible participant . Arm assignment use random allocation make volunteer screened eligibility , provide consent participation , complete baseline data collection procedure . Follow-up data collection occur six twelve month post-randomization . Data collection procedure three time point include AUDIT questionnaire , behavioral interview , gynecological exam include STI diagnosis treatment , HIV rapid test counseling .
DOC.criteria: Female sex worker , define woman self report exchange type sex include oral , anal , vaginal sex money gift within six month prior study enrollment ; Selfidentifies woman ; 18 year old ; Scores 719 AUDIT questionnaire ; Willing participate study data collection procedure ; Lives Mombasa plan reside Mombasa 12 month follow study enrollment ; Currently participate APHIA II sex worker peer education program ; Documentation negative test gonorrhea , Chlamydia , trichomoniasis . Scores less 7 ( lowrisk drinking ) 19 ( highrisk drinking/alcohol dependence ) AUDIT questionnaire ; Plans away next 12 month six month relocate away study site ; Currently participate another HIV intervention study ; Has condition , opinion investigator designee , would preclude provision inform consent , make participation study unsafe , complicate interpretation study outcome data , otherwise achieve study objective .
